section.p: The boat takes you upriver as far as a little village, where you are made welcome by the locals who are curious for any news. You stay with them for a few days, regaling them with the tales of your travels. Recover 1 Stamina point if injured.
Soon it is time for the barge to make its return journey. ‘Will you come back with us?’ asks the barge master. ‘Or do you intend to go looking for that shrine?’
